snippet: The Army will expand a program offering a fast track to citizenship for immigrants with special language or medical skills.
abstract: Army will expand Military Accessions Vital to the National Interest (Mavni), program offering fast track citizenship for immigrants with special language or medical skills, to 3,000 enlistments in 2015 and 5,000 in 2016, up from 1,500 limit.
lead_paragraph: The Army will expand a program offering a fast track to citizenship for immigrants with special language or medical skills.

headline.main: Army Offering More a Fast Track to Citizenship
headline.print_headline: Army Offering More a Fast Track to Citizenship

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
